price: 69. Tolobaki: Eh móto! Zala malili mpe kimia тропа Ibrâhîm.
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
